project_descr: LoGIC is to promote local action on climate change adaptation at scale. It will address climate change impact in Bangladesh. LoGIC is designed to support 200,000 most vulnerable households in 72 unions in seven districts. Project duration is 48 months.

outputs.output_descr: Local Government Initiative on CLimate Change (LoGIC) project will support roughly 200,000 most vulnerable households in 100 unions in seven districts in Bangladesh.

project_title: local government initiatives on climate change (logic)
